snippet: The first attack was aimed at a NATO convoy, and the second an office of the Afghan intelligence agency.
abstract: Taliban kills one Afghan soldier and wounds at least five others in two attacks on NATO and Afghan forces in Kabul.

byline.contributor: Ahmad Shakib and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The first attack was aimed at a NATO convoy, and the second an office of the Afghan intelligence agency.

headline.main: In Two Attacks, Taliban Target NATO and Afghan Forces
headline.print_headline: 2 Attacks in Kabul Target NATO and Afghan Forces
